players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Bob was killed, so mafia is alive. I suspect Charlie because he was silent. Let's vote him out."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be the mafia. He knows I'm the detective. Vote him out."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective. No other suspect. Vote him out."
You: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is mafia. He was silent and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie out."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob. Maybe Alice did. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
